titles.title: National Dam Safety Program Reauthorization Act of 2023
National Dam Safety Program Reauthorization Act of 2023
To amend the National Dam Safety Program Act to reauthorize that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

bill.summary:
National Dam Safety Program Reauthorization Act of 2023
This bill extends through FY2028 several initiatives relating to dam safety. Specifically, the bill extends (1) the National Dam Safety Program of the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA); (2) the Interagency Committee on Dam Safety; (3) FEMA's National Inventory of Dams; and (4) outreach, research, training, and staff personnel related to dam safety.
